issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The fallback format is being used for the DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute actions response message:

{code}
# euca-describe-network-interface-attribute -a eni-1278bb0b --debug
2015-01-14 18:28:52,095 DEBUG   DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'Attribute': 'attachment', 'NetworkInterfaceId': 'eni-1278bb0b', 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None, 'region': None}
2015-01-14 18:28:52,095 INFO    Config finding global option default-region
2015-01-14 18:28:52,095 INFO    Config   novalue for default-region
2015-01-14 18:28:52,095 INFO    Config finding global option max-retries
2015-01-14 18:28:52,095 INFO    Config   novalue for max-retries
2015-01-14 18:28:52,095 INFO    Config finding global option timeout
2015-01-14 18:28:52,095 INFO    Config   novalue for timeout
2015-01-14 18:28:52,099 INFO    DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute', 'Attribute': 'attachment', 'NetworkInterfaceId': 'eni-1278bb0b', 'Version': '2014-06-15'}
2015-01-14 18:28:52,099 INFO    EC2 sending request (attempt 1 of 3)
2015-01-14 18:28:52,100 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.111.5.94:8773\n/services/compute\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIF5SL4O4IOSBXBI3FU&Action=DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute&Attribute=attachment&NetworkInterfaceId=eni-1278bb0b&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2015-01-15T02%3A28%3A52Z&Version=2014-06-15'
2015-01-14 18:28:52,100 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: SoMl479gbQ7Jeglmz3fMOoMzZH54HgWa7QDmQ0SITU8=
2015-01-14 18:28:52,100 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data
2015-01-14 18:28:52,108 DEBUG   EC2 request method: POST
2015-01-14 18:28:52,108 DEBUG   EC2 request url:    http://10.111.5.94:8773/services/compute
2015-01-14 18:28:52,108 DEBUG   EC2 request header: Content-Length: 286
2015-01-14 18:28:52,108 DEBUG   EC2 request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
2015-01-14 18:28:52,108 DEBUG   EC2 request header: Host: 10.111.5.94:8773
2015-01-14 18:28:52,108 DEBUG   EC2 request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.2.0-pre1-57-g94c0859 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-504.3.3.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.2.3 requests/1.1.0
2015-01-14 18:28:52,108 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   AWSAccessKeyId: AKIF5SL4O4IOSBXBI3FU
2015-01-14 18:28:52,108 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   Action: DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute
2015-01-14 18:28:52,108 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   Attribute: attachment
2015-01-14 18:28:52,109 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   NetworkInterfaceId: eni-1278bb0b
2015-01-14 18:28:52,109 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   Signature: SoMl479gbQ7Jeglmz3fMOoMzZH54HgWa7QDmQ0SITU8=
2015-01-14 18:28:52,109 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256
2015-01-14 18:28:52,109 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   SignatureVersion: 2
2015-01-14 18:28:52,109 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   Timestamp: 2015-01-15T02:28:52Z
2015-01-14 18:28:52,109 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   Version: 2014-06-15
2015-01-14 18:28:52,169 DEBUG   EC2 response time: 0.060 seconds
2015-01-14 18:28:52,169 INFO    EC2 response status: 200
2015-01-14 18:28:52,169 DEBUG   EC2 response header: content-length: 831
2015-01-14 18:28:52,169 DEBUG   EC2 response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
2015-01-14 18:28:52,169 DEBUG   DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute -- response content --
<euca:Compute.DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttributeResponseType xmlns:euca="http://msgs.eucalyptus.com/4.1.0"><euca:VpcMessage><euca:ComputeMessage><euca:correlationId>3df8e8de-f131-4fcb-99bd-f6ff3763957a</euca:correlationId><euca:_return>true</euca:_return><euca:_services/><euca:_disabledServices/><euca:_notreadyServices/><euca:_stoppedServices/></euca:ComputeMessage></euca:VpcMessage><euca:attachment><euca:attachmentId>eni-attach-d04e3144</euca:attachmentId><euca:instanceId>i-92dfdbe8</euca:instanceId><euca:instanceOwnerId>957038163686</euca:instanceOwnerId><euca:deviceIndex>0</euca:deviceIndex><euca:status>attached</euca:status><euca:attachTime>2015-01-15T00:32:01.056Z</euca:attachTime><euca:deleteOnTermination>false</euca:deleteOnTermination></euca:attachment></euca:Compute.DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttributeResponseType>
2015-01-14 18:28:52,170 DEBUG   DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute -- end of response content --
NETWORKINTERFACE		attachment
ATTACHMENT		0	attached	2015-01-15T00:32:01.056Z	false
{code}

The prefix "euca:" should not be used and the element names are also incorrect.
fields.summary: EC2 DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute response message format incorrect

comments.body: This is due to not setting the identifier for the network interface in the response so is a one line fix.

Fix Verified

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.1.0
Release     : 0.0.23038.363.20150120git689fdd5.el6

DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute response message has proper format
{code}
[root@a-25 ~]# euca-describe-network-interface-attribute -a eni-a2d023c0 --debug
2015-01-20 23:49:23,362 DEBUG   DescribeNetworkInterfaceAttribute parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'Attribute': 'attachment', 'NetworkInterfaceId': 'eni-a2d023c0', 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None, 'region': None}

2015-01-20 23:49:23,364 INFO    Config   novalue for timeout
